## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0c7d0ea07d51fa1a590737fa0586578db983b776c21cb15f0597463d7046dea8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'meli-cache' @ 999.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
